ViewObject.Name: XxGamMaCostCenterFlexLovVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT b.flex_value||'-'||bu.flex_value cost_center_flex, b.enabled_flag enabled_flag, b.summary_flag summary_flag, T.description description, lt.meaning vc_meaning, lt.lookup_type vc_lookup_type, lt.lookup_code vc_lookup_code, b.compiled_value_attributes, substr(lt.meaning,1,length(lt.meaning)-2)||'XX' vc_meaningxx FROM fnd_flex_value_sets fvs, fnd_flex_values_tl T, fnd_flex_values b, /** ubi **/ fnd_flex_value_sets fvu, fnd_flex_values_tl tu, fnd_flex_values bu, /**lkp**/ fnd_lookup_values lt WHERE 1=1 AND fvs.flex_value_set_id = b.flex_value_set_id AND b.flex_value_id = T.flex_value_id AND T.LANGUAGE = userenv ('LANG') AND b.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND b.summary_flag = 'N' AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN nvl(b.start_date_active,trunc(sysdate)) AND NVL(b.end_date_active, to_date('31/12/4712','DD/MM/RRRR')) /** 26/11/2015**/ AND fvs.flex_value_set_name = 'GAM_GL_CENTRO_COSTOS' /**ubi**/ AND fvu.flex_value_set_id = bu.flex_value_set_id AND bu.flex_value_id = tu.flex_value_id AND tu.LANGUAGE = userenv ('LANG') AND bu.end_date_active IS NULL AND bu.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND bu.summary_flag = 'N' AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN nvl(bu.start_date_active,trunc(sysdate)) AND NVL(bu.end_date_active, to_date('31/12/4712','DD/MM/RRRR')) /** 26/11/2015**/ AND fvu.flex_value_set_name = 'GAM_GL_UBICACION' /**lkp**/ AND lt.LANGUAGE = userenv('LANG') and lt.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND lt.lookup_code = b.flex_value||'-'||bu.flex_value AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN nvl(lt.start_date_active,trunc(sysdate)) AND NVL(lt.end_date_active, to_date('31/12/4712','DD/MM/RRRR')) /** 26/11/2015**/ UNION /** Agregado para considerar las unidades opera que no sean 02_AEROMEXICO **/ SELECT b.flex_value||'-'||bu.flex_value cost_center_flex, b.enabled_flag enabled_flag, b.summary_flag summary_flag, T.description description, lt.description vc_meaning, /** Se remplazo lt.meaning vc_meaning, **/ lt.lookup_type vc_lookup_type, lt.meaning vc_lookup_code, /** Se remplazo lt.lookup_code vc_lookup_code, **/ b.compiled_value_attributes, substr(lt.description,1,length(lt.description)-2)||'XX' vc_meaningxx FROM fnd_flex_value_sets fvs, fnd_flex_values_tl T, fnd_flex_values b, /** ubi **/ fnd_flex_value_sets fvu, fnd_flex_values_tl tu, fnd_flex_values bu, fnd_lookup_values lt WHERE 1=1 AND fvs.flex_value_set_id = b.flex_value_set_id AND b.flex_value_id = T.flex_value_id AND T.LANGUAGE = userenv ('LANG') AND b.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND b.summary_flag = 'N' AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN nvl(b.start_date_active,trunc(sysdate)) AND NVL(b.end_date_active, to_date('31/12/4712','DD/MM/RRRR')) /** 26/11/2015**/ AND fvs.flex_value_set_name = 'GAM_GL_CENTRO_COSTOS' /**ubi**/ AND fvu.flex_value_set_id = bu.flex_value_set_id AND bu.flex_value_id = tu.flex_value_id AND tu.LANGUAGE = userenv ('LANG') AND bu.end_date_active IS NULL AND bu.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND bu.summary_flag = 'N' AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN nvl(bu.start_date_active,trunc(sysdate)) AND NVL(bu.end_date_active, to_date('31/12/4712','DD/MM/RRRR')) /** 26/11/2015**/ AND fvu.flex_value_set_name = 'GAM_GL_UBICACION' /**lkp**/ AND lt.LANGUAGE = userenv('LANG') AND lt.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND lt.meaning = b.flex_value||'-'||bu.flex_value /** AND lt.lookup_code = b.flex_value||'-'||bu.flex_value **/ AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN nvl(lt.start_date_active,trunc(sysdate)) AND NVL(lt.end_date_active, to_date('31/12/4712','DD/MM/RRRR')) /** 26/11/2015**/
